column4: hi all, anybody want to help me out here, ubuntu, starts up bar moves accross screen and then when i should get my desktop i just get balck screen, shade chnges as it trys to fire up a couple of times but thats it........... i think i need to get vesa driver functioning buti dont know how,,, ive been trying all day, somebody please

anybody hi all, anybody want to help me out here, ubuntu, starts up bar moves accross screen and then when i should get my desktop i just get balck screen, shade chnges as it trys to fire up a couple of times but thats it........... i think i need to get vesa driver functioning buti dont know how,,, ive been trying all day, somebody please

hi all, anybody want to help me out here, ubuntu, starts up bar moves accross screen and then when i should get my desktop i just get balck screen, shade chnges as it trys to fire up a couple of times but thats it........... i think i need to get vesa driver functioning buti dont know how,,, ive been trying all day, somebody please, ati radeon mobility hd2600
go to console, (alt+ctrl+f1), log-in, type sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf , find section "driver" and replace entry with vesa, save, reboot
